exitSurveyWarningDialog.title: Do you want to exit the questionnaire?
exitSurveyWarningDialog.warning: All information you have previously entered will be lost if you exit the questionnaire. Are you sure you want to stop?

noSurveyLoaded: Loading failed. Please refresh the page.
notValidQuestion: Please select a valid answer for all questions.

surveyLoadingError.content:
Unfortunately, something went wrong loading the questionnaire.

Please try again or contact our [support](mailto:support@grippenet.ch) if the problem persists.

surveySubmissionError.content:
Unfortunately, something went wrong while sending the questionnaire.

Please try again or contact our [support](mailto:support@grippenet.ch) if the problem persists.

submitSuccessDialog.title: Info
submitSuccessDialog.content: Your questionnaire has been submitted successfully.
